Web Dev.question: Why is storing JWT tokens in localStorage considered less secure than using HTTP-only cookies?

options.B: localStorage is vulnerable to XSS attacks

Web Dev.question: What issue can occur if you don’t properly handle asynchronous errors in Node.js?

options.B: Silent promise rejections and unstable server behavior

Web Dev.question: Why should input validation be performed on both frontend and backend?

options.C: Frontend can be bypassed by attackers

Web Dev.question: Why can improper useEffect dependencies in React cause infinite re-renders?

Mobile Dev.question: Why is it risky to store sensitive data (like API keys) directly in a mobile app?

options.B: APK/IPA files can be reverse engineered

Mobile Dev.question: What problem does dependency injection solve in mobile apps?
Why is handling app lifecycle events critical?

options.B: To avoid leaks and unnecessary background resource usage

Mobile Dev.question: What is a main tradeoff of cross-platform frameworks?

options.B: Possible performance limitations compared to native

AI.question: Why does overfitting reduce performance on unseen data?

options.B: It memorizes training data instead of generalizing

AI.question: Why is normalization important before training neural networks?

options.B: It ensures stable and faster convergence

AI.question: What problem does dropout aim to reduce?

options.B: Model becomes biased toward majority class

Cybersecurity.question: What is the main goal of a CSRF attack?

options.B: Trick authenticated users into performing unintended actions

Cybersecurity.question: Why is hashing passwords better than encrypting them?

options.C: Hashing is one-way and prevents recovering original passwords

Cybersecurity.question: What does the principle of least privilege enforce?
Why is HTTPS more secure than HTTP?

options.B: It uses TLS to encrypt communication
